com.hybris.cis.facade.subscription

Class PropertyServiceConfigurationServiceClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.cis.facade.subscription.PropertyServiceConfigurationServiceClientImpl

  • public class PropertyServiceConfigurationServiceClientImpl
extends java.lang.Object

    A very simple, properties file based {} implementation which we can use as a mock and until we have access to the real subscription service.

    Expects properties of the following format: {username}.{serviceId}.{property}

      • getProperties

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getProperties(java.lang.String tenantId,
                                                                      java.lang.String service)
                                                               throws NoSuchServiceException
        This method parses the properties for service type and configuration options for property file base subscriptions.
        Parameters:
        tenantId - the tenant Id
        service - the service id
        Returns:
        a map with configuration options which otherwise would be provided by the configuration service
        Throws:
        NoSuchServiceException
